home-screen-translations.loader-description: The educational resource you have requested is being generated.  This may take a few minutes
home-screen-translations.screen-description: Easily generate educational resources in different formats such as text, images, charts or tables with AI to speed up the preparation of your classes!
home-screen-translations.ia-info-card-description: If you want to improve your request to generate a resource more adapted to what you want you can press the pencil icon button to edit your request.

request-resource-form-labels.form-input-file-placeholder: If you upload a file, the Eduka AI will analyze the file to give you the educational resource. Attach a file (PDF, webp, jpg, txt) 5MB max

request-resource-form-error-messages.subject-error-required-msg: The name of the subject is mandatory
request-resource-form-error-messages.subject-error-min-msg: The name of the subject must have at least 3 characters
request-resource-form-error-messages.resource-type-error-required-msg: The type of academic resource is mandatory
request-resource-form-error-messages.resource-format-error-required-msg: The format of the resource is mandatory
request-resource-form-error-messages.language-error-required-msg: The language to generate the resource is mandatory
request-resource-form-error-messages.file-size-error-msg: The file must be 5MB or less

save-resource-form-error-messages.name-error-required-msg: The title of the resource is mandatory
save-resource-form-error-messages.name-error-min-msg: The title must be at least 3 characters long

my-resources-screen-translations.delete-resources-pop-up-msg: Are you sure you want to delete the selected resources?
my-resources-screen-translations.screen-description: In this section you can manage the different educational resources you have generated. You can download them, share them or delete the resources you do not need.
my-resources-screen-translations.loader-description: The educational resources are being downloaded. The process may take a few seconds.
my-resources-screen-translations.can-access-info: You have access to view and manage the saved previews of your resources for:

download-history-screen-translations.screen-description: Easily view and share your converted and downloaded resources.
download-history-screen-translations.file-list-empty-msg: Your educational resources history is empty
download-history-screen-translations.can-access-info: You have access to manage your downloaded resources for:

operations-messages.remove-key-not-found-error-msg: The storage key does not exist
operations-messages.download-resource-warning-msg: Generate the resource first before downloading it
operations-messages.resource-downloaded-success-msg: Downloaded resource, View in download history
operations-messages.select-resources-warn-msg: No resources have been selected for download
operations-messages.no-info-warn-msg: No information on the resource request
operations-messages.copy-ia-result-error-msg: An error occurred while copying the text
operations-messages.download-resource-error-msg: An error occurred while downloading the resource
operations-messages.list-download-files-error-msg: An error occurred while loading the history
operations-messages.share-file-warn-msg: Cannot share file on this device
operations-messages.share-file-error-msg: An error occurred while sharing the resource
operations-messages.remove-file-error-msg: An error occurred while deleting the downloaded resource
operations-messages.async-storage-set-error-msg: An error occurred while saving the element
operations-messages.async-storage-get-error-msg: An error occurred while obtaining the element
operations-messages.async-storage-remove-error-msg: An error occurred while deleting the key

no-conected-wifi-label: Not connected to the Internet, connect to an Internet network to generate your educational resources.

subscriptions-screen-labels.screen-description: A subscription is required to use our app. Choose the plan that best suits your needs.
subscriptions-screen-labels.monthly-plan-description: Save time and enhance your teaching by accessing all Eduka IA tools for a full month to generate educational content with artificial intelligence.
subscriptions-screen-labels.annual-plan-description: Save time and enhance your teaching with full-year access to all Eduka IA tools for generating educational content with artificial intelligence.
subscriptions-screen-labels.success-purchase-msg: You've successfully subscribed! You can now start creating your resources.
subscriptions-screen-labels.error-purchase-msg: An error occurred while subscribing to the selected plan or the purchase was canceled.

expired-access-box-labels.title: Subscribe again to regain the access
expired-access-box-labels.description: The period of 30 days since the cancellation of your subscription to Eduka IA has expired, to regain access you can renew it by clicking on the button below.
